# GL261 Downsampling Utils

This file contains utility functions for downsampling a preprocessed Seurat object to different conditions.

```{r}
# Set libpaths
.libPaths(c("/raleighlab/data1/czou/gbm_perturb/gbm_perturb/renv/library/R-4.3/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu", .libPaths()))
```

Import libraries

```{r}
library(Seruat)
```

## Downsample by condition x context

This will ensure that each ContextPerturb_RT and ContextPerturb_noRT have the same number of cells. Intended downstream analysis involves comparing the number of differential genes in RT and noRT conditions.
